00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "operators.h"
00009 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00010 
00011 int findFunctionID(MavenCompiler* c, int namespaceID, int objectID, string function, MavenVariables args, bool strict) {
00012         if(namespaceID < 0 || objectID < 0) return -1;
00013         bool match = false;
00014         
00015         // because function can be overloaded with multiple interchangable types
00016         // we try to first see if there is an exact match
00017         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->length(); ++i) {
00018                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).name == function &&
00019                    c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).args.length() == args.length()) {
00020                         match = true;
00021                         for(int j = 0; j < args.length(); ++j) {
00022                                 if(!canCastBetween(c, args[j].type,
00023                                                                    c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).args[j].type, true, true)) {
00024                                         match = false;
00025                                         break;
00026                                 }
00027                         }
00028                         if(match) return i;
00029                 }
00030         }
00031         
00032         // ok not so strict now
00033         if(!strict) {
00034                 for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->length(); ++i) {
00035                         if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).name == function &&
00036                            c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).args.length() == args.length()) {
00037                                 match = true;
00038                                 for(int j = 0; j < args.length(); ++j) {
00039                                         if(!canCastBetween(c, args[j].type, c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).args[j].type, false, true)) {
00040                                                 match = false;
00041                                                 break;
00042                                         }
00043                                 }
00044                                 if(match) return i;
00045                         }
00046                 }
00047         }
00048         
00049         // can't find a suitable match
00050         return -1;
00051 }
